Module.Name: Absorption factors
Module.Description: Absorption factors relate exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes (dietary, non-dietary oral, dermal, inhalation) to an internal (WholeBody) compartment. Alternatively, (default) absorption factors can be set in the interface.
Module.ShortDescription: Absorption factors relate exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes or compartments to an internal (WholeBody) compartment.
Module.DataDescription: Specify nondietary absorption factors as data.
